documents.document: @JonoNewton @MetService Oh indeed. Obvious misinformation but seems like they at least drew from a source.
@JonoNewton @MetService Sounds like a misunderstanding of the Tararua ranges warning? https://t.co/6zYiyId6s7
@ChrisRMcDonald Ha that would seem to fit the theme wouldn't it.
@ChrisRMcDonald this is amazing! I'm assuming you're already onto a mock up? ;)
@yomcat @JayHarvie Will be nice to see some of the teams that don't normally make that effort to start being at the clubrooms.
@yomcat @JayHarvie Yep field pressure made that worse tho e.g Elite played a "home" game at Wilton, but we come back regardless.
@yomcat @JayHarvie I can imagine. It's been tough losing that and also losing Newtown 1 for most of season with the U20 WC too!
@yomcat @JayHarvie Seatoun and UH could have social men's playing curtain raiser for the WCL?
@JayHarvie Yeah it's 100% a great change for you and many others in your situation.
@JayHarvie Newtown in particular might be good though with the number 2 in theory available for teams to play at home again.
@JayHarvie Us social league battlers are often at curtain raiser times too. You'll pick up some spectators but lose others I guess?
@JayHarvie Overall probably a great move but might mean a further drop in spectators with people playing e.g. me
@arniesean YF Zone is in Block A. So grab a ticket there if you are wanting to join us.
Step out of line and be fired. This seems set to become a scary new normal in the US. https://t.co/JxXYeocG0c
@JayHarvie @Tegal1234 @patrick478 Just to be clear though I think it can be done well but often isn't. e.g. Panhead is still great for now.
@JayHarvie @Tegal1234 @patrick478 Remember mac's and monteith's....
@ShaneHarmon Where do I send the bribe to upgrade my platinum seats to backstage? ;)
@pineyzb @patrick478 @Dale_Warburton This. Not obeying the terms of any ban should simply result in further and harsher sanction.
@Dale_Warburton @patrick478 Completely agree. I couldn't see anything about that in my quick skim though. All seems to be physical locations
@Dale_Warburton @patrick478 I'd think so. But it could be really poor wording choice that was *meant* to mean just the area of play.
@Dale_Warburton @patrick478 Comp rules state they supersede that but what exactly does 'playing arena' mean in 5.13 https://t.co/89wZJ4KFEY
@Dale_Warburton @patrick478 He's talking about 12.2 from here which then refers to 13.1 but thats not the comp rules https://t.co/4oLj9K8QDY
@patrick478 @Ryans_Rovers Our main two are yellow and black sure but white is certainly one of our long standing brand colours. Kits too.
@patrick478 @Ryans_Rovers That's probably why they use it as the accent colour on the website too. Def one of their brand colours.
@Dale_Warburton Hmm perhaps we should rethink this bus to New Plymouth?
@ChrisRMcDonald @The_Nighthawks @Dale_Warburton @patrick478 Then again perhaps Dale means on the website?
@Dale_Warburton @patrick478 @ChrisRMcDonald What? I like the latest version on the hoodies? Don't mess with it plz.
@Tegal1234 nah we all good. Where are you watching from?
@Tegal1234 I'd say so based on the staff.
@Tegal1234 yeah upstairs closed due to someone in strife up there?
@IamNotJonahHill @Tegal1234 Do we think the 'after' photo is down to a filter or a rocking buzz?
@Coleadve @vaughndavis Ha seems we are on the same google journey at the same time.
@vaughndavis @Coleadve Best guess says maybe Gemstar but looks like lots of different regional names - https://t.co/EVJuktfTnb
@NZPhotomac @patrick478 Disagree - he clearly kicks it into the post.
@Ryans_Rovers Oh wow so a three way tie on 3 wins. I'll have to make it back into prem this time so I don't fall too far behind!
@JayHarvie We've prepared a standard Wellington landing for you. Enjoy!
BREAKING NEWS - NZ participates in sports other than rugby! https://t.co/cQdsbM2VFh
@Ryans_Rovers Ta doing now. Random q - do your records show who has the most Prem championships?
@patrick478 Basically I think 1.5 would be pretty decent outcome for Oceania. Two only makes sense if Aussie move back.
@patrick478 Obviously with more auto spots the quality of playoff opp would drop but still good for the islands I'd say.
@patrick478 They'd also get to host a game though? I'd think the exposure to a decent opp would be good. Similar to us now.
@Yorrike Exactly. I remember upgrading from a 250 mb to a gig and thinking that was so much how would I ever fill it.
@Yorrike It's crazy these days deleting single files that are many times larger than the first hard drives I owned.
People probably need to actually read the Altaba story rather than just the headline huh? It's only the part that owns Alibaba shares....
@Ryans_Rovers @JP_BNE Of course it was the week you play me as well...
@Tegal1234 @patrick478 The actual temp isn't different but some conditions are better/worse conductors of that temp to your skin.
@Tegal1234 @patrick478 I think it's easiest to think of it as how easily the heat transfers to your skin. Diff conditions change that.
@patrick478 the assistant clearly saw it. It's literally in front of him
Surely even @TheRealBozza can agree the referees are bringing nothing to the league with shit like that.
A yellow for a headbutt? You're kidding right?
@patrick478 probably depends what it goes down as for? Dangerous play I guess?
Only 5.5? That doesn't seem right #eqnz
Well that'll keep you on your toes huh #eqnz
@kiwibardy Haha maybe a combo of both!
Wind or #eqnz? #WellingtonRoulette
@NZPhotomac @Yakcall @sthnjeff Are we engaging with him on this?! I used to have a soap addiction. It was a dirty habit but I'm clean now.
@Tegal1234 Once Trump quotes from an article is that quote now a verifiable source and open to publishing as real news?
@Tegal1234 Yup - and equally one fake news source being used as proof by "fact checkers" for another fake news article.
Good change to see but with so many sources publishing this stuff now we might already be too far gone.… https://t.co/DKBrua3JQI
@Yakcall Ha you made the mistake of posting?

Nothing like a go around to welcome you back to Wellington
@ACFCsupporters @coolian2 @roryosffx @official_lesdog @pauljmharper cheers boys. Made the airport with too much time too spare!
I reckon they probably need a couple more flags #ESvAC https://t.co/NpcrufDEA8
@ACFCsupporters @GforGegenPress @roryosffx @coolian2 @tintin25 @official_lesdog @saulov8 @OfficialSpursNZ I'll make it about 12ish.
@Tegal1234 @Dale_Warburton Yep. Which sadly is probably why you need a few trials where it doesn't work to realise it didn't work.
@Dale_Warburton Completely agree. I don't understand complete opposition to it. There will be some elements that work great and improve game
@Dale_Warburton The only way to find that balance is to have a few times where it clearly doesn't work and realise "that was too much"
@Dale_Warburton I remain convinced you can bring in elements that work. Eg goal line tech. But have to strike the right balance.
@Dale_Warburton That will end well...
@nzsecretsanta Hey team - where do I update the email you have for me? Looks like it' probably using the one from when I signed up in 2013!
@WestpacStadium Ah yup. Cool! Was it a stabilised turf last time too then?
@WestpacStadium All natural? Or is it hybrid this time around?
@Tegal1234 @Nakiman You also can't send credit cards but that's how mine have always arrived. I think it's a don't ask don't tell.
@Tegal1234 @Nakiman @nzpost I'd guess it makes stealing the post a target? Same as jewelry etc. Your risk sure but also the postie's safety
@Tegal1234 @Nakiman @nzpost Pretty sure that sending cash and vouchers has long been banned. Don't think that's anything new.
@ByPhillipRollo @patrick478 Results maybe. But clubs financial stability is their own issue. Tickets sales go to clubs not FFA.
@patrick478 Not to mention the 5200 for CCM in an actual home game only two rounds ago
@patrick478 Well it is a pretty poor figure but isn't it the FFA pushing for the games out of Wellington anyway...?
@patrick478 Ugh. Who has been bringing it up today?
@CarlyW226 I think you can safely assume that's not true.
@Ryans_Rovers Yeah. Pretty sure it'll be a new one now.
@Ryans_Rovers I think if it's within 2 years you get to renew. After that it's new.
@sthnjeff @patrick478 @ACFCsupporters I don't think I'll cut it that fine luckily. 90 mins to make it what looks to be a 25 minute drive.
@sthnjeff @patrick478 @ACFCsupporters Yeah. I'd only risk that if there was lots of scope for delay and still making it. $50 uber tho.
@patrick478 @ACFCsupporters Could always split fare an uber if there are two of us.
@ACFCsupporters My rough glance makes it look plausible to make a 5:30 flight so I might be keen.
@ACFCsupporters What are travel options/times like from there to airport?
@AdamRyan @Ryans_Rovers Ugh. I've been a dire run since this season began.
@Ryans_Rovers True but with a quote about how Victory are "doing it the hard way" it still feels a bit rich. Many clubs have same or worse.
